title: Tip 01
subtitle:
CHECK FOR
HANDS AND
FINGERS
description: AI often struggles with realistic hand placement and finger details, so examine these closely.

title: Tip 02
subtitle:
LOOK AT
FACIAL
FEATURES
description: Check for asymmetry in facial features, odd eye placement, unnatural skin textures, or expressions that don't match the situation.

title: Tip 03
subtitle:
SCAN THE
BACKGROUND
description: Look for blurry or pixelated background elements, objects that don't fit the scene, or strange color gradients.

title: Tip 04
subtitle:
SPOT
CONTEXTUAL
ERRORS
description: Pay attention to details that might not make sense within the image, like text that is illegible or objects that don't belong.

title: Tip 05
subtitle:
LOOK FOR
DISTORTED
LOGOS OR TEXT
description: Look for minor details that appear off, like an odd number of fingers, misplaced objects, or strange proportions.

title: Tip 06
subtitle:
PAY ATTENTION
TO LIGHTING
AND SHADOWS
description: Observe if shadows fall in an illogical way or if lighting seems inconsistent across the image.

title: Tip 07
subtitle:
CHECK
TEXTURES
AND PATTERNS
description: Check for unnatural repetition of patterns in clothing, hair, or other textures.

title: Tip 08
subtitle:
ARE THERE
DIGITAL
ARTIFACTS?
description: Pixelation, strange colors, or blurriness in unexpected places can indicate AI manipulation.

title: Tip 09
subtitle:
REVERSE
IMAGE
SEARCH
description: Use a search engine to see if the image appears elsewhere online and check for potential sources or inconsistencies.

title: Tip 10
subtitle:
CHECK THE
SOURCE
description: Be cautious of images from websites known for generating or sharing AI-generated content.
